titles.title: To amend the definition of State in certain Federal agricultural laws to include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 4/12/2013--Introduced. Amends the McIntire-Stennis Cooperative Forestry Act and the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to include within the definition of "state" the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.
